# `r fa("book", fill = "steelblue")` Readings

``` {r echo=FALSE}
df <- tribble(
  ~text, ~chapter,
  "R4DS", "[Chapter 7 Exploratory Data Analysis](https://r4ds.had.co.nz/exploratory-data-analysis.html){target=\"_blank\"}",
  "IDS", "[Chapter 8 Visualizing data distributions](https://rafalab.github.io/dsbook/distributions.html){target=\"_blank\"}",
  "IDS", "[Chapter 9 Data visualization in practice](https://rafalab.github.io/dsbook/gapminder.html){target=\"_blank\"}",
  "IDS", "[Chapter 10 Data visualization principles](https://rafalab.github.io/dsbook/data-visualization-principles.html){target=\"_blank\"}"
)

knitr::kable(df, escape = F, col.names=NULL) %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = "striped")
```
